altTitle: The Emperor's Lady-in-Waiting Is Wanted as a Bride
皇帝つき女官は花嫁として望まれ中
He hopes for the Court Lady of the Emperor as his bride
The Court Lady of the Emperor Is Hoped for as His Bride
The Emperor Hopes for the Court Lady as His Bride
title: Kotei-tsuki Jokan wa Hanayome to Shite Nozomare Naka
